@description.body:

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2011 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. @description.name: @description
@description.body:
A toggle Button widget If the user tap the button, the button toggles between the ON and OFF state. Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

   var button = new qx.ui.mobile.form.ToggleButton(false,"YES","NO");
   button.addListener("changeValue", function(e) {
     alert(e.getData());
   }, this);
   this.getRoot.add(button);

This example creates a toggle button and attaches an event listener to the {@link #changeValue} event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean?null} The value of the button

@param.name: @param
@param.body: labelChecked {Boolean?"ON"} The value of the text display when toggleButton is active
@param.description: The value of the text display when toggleButton is active

@param.name: @param
@param.body: labelUnchecked {Boolean?"OFF"} The value of the text display when toggleButton is inactive
@param.description: The value of the text display when toggleButton is inactive

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the child control of the toggle button.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the switch control of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the value [true/false] of this toggle button. It is called by setValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean} the new value of the toggle button
@param.description: the new value of the toggle button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the value [true/false] of this toggle button. It is called by getValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} the value of the toggle button
@return.description: the value of the toggle button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggles the value of the button.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the tap event occurs. Toggles the button.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Tap} The tap event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the swipe event occurs. Toggles the button, when.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Swipe} The swipe event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if last touch event (swipe,tap) is more than 500ms ago. Bugfix for several simulator/emulator, when tap is immediately followed by a swipe.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the last event was more than 500ms ago
@return.description: true if the last event was more than 500ms ago
